tachyon.security.authentication

Class PlainSaslUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • tachyon.security.authentication.PlainSaslUtils

  • public final class PlainSaslUtils
extends Object
    Because the Java SunSASL provider doesn't support the server-side PLAIN mechanism. There is a new provider PlainSaslServerProvider needed to support server-side PLAIN mechanism. PlainSaslHelper is used to register this provider. It also provides methods to generate PLAIN transport for server and client.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  PlainSaslUtils.PlainClientCallbackHandler
      A client side callback to put application provided username/password into SASL transport.

      • isPlainSaslProviderAdded

        public static boolean isPlainSaslProviderAdded()

      • getPlainServerTransportFactory

        public static org.apache.thrift.transport.TTransportFactory getPlainServerTransportFactory(AuthType authType,
                                                                                           TachyonConf conf)
                                                                                    throws SaslException
        For server side, get a PLAIN mechanism TTransportFactory. A callback handler is hooked for specific authentication methods.
        Parameters:
        authType - the authentication type
        conf - TachyonConf
        Returns:
        a corresponding TTransportFactory, which is PLAIN mechanism
        Throws:
        SaslException - if an AuthenticationProvider is not found

      • getPlainClientTransport

        public static org.apache.thrift.transport.TTransport getPlainClientTransport(String username,
                                                                             String password,
                                                                             org.apache.thrift.transport.TTransport wrappedTransport)
                                                                      throws SaslException
        Gets a PLAIN mechanism transport for client side.
        Parameters:
        username - User Name of PlainClient
        password - Password of PlainClient
        wrappedTransport - The original Transport
        Returns:
        Wrapped transport with PLAIN mechanism
        Throws:
        SaslException - if an AuthenticationProvider is not found
